players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I am the Mafioso and I killed Bob last night. Stay cautious, as there might be more Mafiosi among us."
Charlie: "I think Diana is telling the truth because she said it herself, but I'm not sure if we can trust her. We should investigate further."
